quote: I once had a thousand desires. But in my one desire to know You, all else melted away.
Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and right-doing, there is a field. I’ll meet you there.
The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don’t go back to sleep.
Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
Dance, when you’re broken open; dance, if you’ve torn the bandage off.
Your heart knows the way. Run in that direction.
What you seek is seeking you.
Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love.
The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open?
Come, come, whoever you are. Wanderer, worshiper, lover of leaving.
Let the beauty we love be what we do.
Love is the bridge between you and everything.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
When the world pushes you to your knees, you’re in the perfect position to pray.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world; today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
Be melting snow; wash yourself of yourself.
Knock, and He’ll open the door. Vanish, and He’ll make you shine like the sun.
I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
If you wish to be a mine of jewels, open the deep ocean within your heart.
The garden of the world has no limits except in your mind.
Come out of the circle of time and into the circle of love.
Your grief is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
The light which shines in you is exactly the same light that shines in everyone.
Let the lover be disgraceful, crazy, absent-minded. Someone sober will worry about things going badly.
You were born with wings. Why prefer to crawl through life?
Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
The soul has been given its own ears to hear things the mind does not understand.
Reason is powerless in the expression of Love.
Death has nothing to do with going away. The sun sets and the moon sets, but they are not gone.
I have lived on the lip of insanity, wanting to know reasons, knocking through a door.
Become the sky. Take an axe to the prison wall.
Why are you so busy with this or that or good or bad; pay attention to how things blend.
What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle.
Inside you there’s an artist you don’t know about.
Ignorant people follow their passions; the wise man lives according to reason.
Meet everyone with a gratified heart.
Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness, are linked together.
He who plants kindness gathers love.
A traveler without observation is a bird without wings.
He who knows himself knows God.
Knowledge without action is wastefulness; action without knowledge is foolishness.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
Trust in God but tie your camel.
Desires make slaves out of kings, and patience makes kings out of slaves.
Sincerity is to the heart what rain is to the earth.
Die before you die and find that there is no death.
Silence is the language of God; all else is poor translation.
Be melting snow; wash yourself of yourself.
Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
Ignite your spiritual flame; the Divine is nearer than your jugular vein.
He who has no faith in himself can never have faith in God.
Knower of hearts, guide us beyond the mind’s illusions.
To know yourself as the lover and the beloved is the flame of love.
Without a guide you can go wrong even in your own house.
Love is the weaver and the fabric of the universe.
I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being.
Fear is the cheapest room in the house. I’d like to see you living in better conditions.
And still, after all this time, the sun never says to the earth, ‘You owe me.’
Run, my dear, from anything that may not strengthen your precious budding wings.
Be kind to your sleeping heart. Take it out into the vast fields of light…and let it breathe.
I carry a torch in one hand and a bucket of water in the other: to set fire to Heaven and put out the flames of Hell.
If I worship You for hope of Paradise, exclude me from it; but if for Your Own sake, withhold not Your Beauty.
The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
Love like mad; in that madness there is a hidden sanity.
The garden of the world has no limits except in your mind.
Every atom with its unique orbit dances to the symphony of the Beloved.
Be empty of worrying; think of Who created thought.
Wherever you stand, be the soul of that place.
I am your abode, and you are my home.
Learn the wisdom of the birds: to live high is to soar above the world’s clamor.
Don’t follow the crowd; they will lead you to mediocrity.
Dance, when you’re broken open; dance, if you’ve torn the bandage off.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
Love is the water of life; drink it down with heart and soul!
The ocean lies all within us.
Every breath we take is filled with blessings.
There are different wells in your heart. Some fill with each good rain; others are far too deep for that.
Oh Khusrau, the river of love runs in strange directions. One who jumps in drowns; one who drowns gets across.
True love is born from understanding.
Spread love wherever you go; let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
Hold yourself as a drop of dew, so the sun of wisdom may shine through you.
If you are irritated by every rub, how will you be polished?
